name: serverless-url-shortener
description: A serverless URL shortener built with Next.js, AWS Lambda, and DynamoDB
author: Jessie Borras <hello@jessiedev.xyz>

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run export
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:backend:prod && npm run deploy:frontend:prod
scripts.deploy:frontend:prod: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run export
scripts.deploy:infrastructure: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/cloudformation.yml --stack-name url-shortener-infrastructure --parameter-overrides Stage=prod ServiceName=url-shortener --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend:fix && npm run lint:backend:fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next frontend/dist backend/.serverless
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env.local && echo 'Please configure your environment variables in frontend/.env.local'
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
